des: Set queue access role. Current role:
Outputs matches from selected date, ex: 02072021
Outputs all teams in selected game queue
Remove selected coach from gameId queue
Add game to list, id is the command - no spaces
Remove game by id from list
Add a channel for match distribution
Add a description for game info, recommended for menu help
Set the maximum number of teams a coach can enter to play
Set day of week by id, day of week Sun = 1 - Sat = 7
Set specific date by id, example: 01152021 = Jan 15, 2021
Set time to open match queue, teams released and matched at start time

Set time window by id, start 0830 = 8:30 am, 
	end 1500 = 3:00pm, enter none for start, end, or both for no time restriction
